alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 4:27AM AKST until February 23 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall in the Nulato Hills and north of Galena.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
